types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# a [[scratch-off]], [[scratch card]] {{gloss|lottery ticket containing sections covered with an opaque waxy film which may be removed by scratching to reveal symbols that show whether or not a prize has been won}}
types.html:
billet à gratter m (plural billets à gratter)

  1. a scratch-off, scratch card (lottery ticket containing sections covered with an opaque waxy film which may be removed by scratching to reveal symbols that show whether or not a prize has been won)

title: billet à gratter
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /bi.jɛ a ɡʁa.te/
